column16: Every visit window +/- 3 days (except for visit 3 which is +/- 2 days); The Screening period includes up to a 4 weeks Run-in period
Consent form can be obtained prior to Visit 1.
History of nasal symptoms should be documented. See Section 5.1 inclusion criterion 5.
Specify type of surgery in source document and eCRF.
Visual assessment to determine presence of nasal polyps by anterior examination.

column1: University of Pennsylvania Smell Identification Test (UPSIT)
Pregnancy test (women of child- bearing potential only)
Hepatitis B surface antigen and Hepatitis C antibody
Dispense MFNS for use as background therapy
Instruct subjects on Diary use, if all screening eligibility criteria are met
